summary: Allocation of Resources Without Limits or Throttling in Apache Avro. A vulnerability in the .NET SDK of Apache Avro allows an attacker to allocate excessive resources, potentially causing a denial-of-service attack. This issue affects .NET applications using Apache Avro and prior versions. Users should update to which addresses this issue.
